name: Movies of Stanley Kubrick Quiz | People Themed | 10 Questions

questions.text: Kubrick directed 'Spartacus'. Who won the Oscar for best supporting actor?
questions.explanation:
Peter Ustinov.

	All were in the movie - all did good jobs. Great movie

questions.text: 'Paths of Glory' was an anti-war film. During what war does the action take place?
questions.explanation:
World War I.

	Kirk Douglas in the lead

questions.text: Kubrick also directed 'Barry Lyndon'. Who wrote the novel?

questions.explanation:
Ryan O'Neal.

	One of his better roles.

questions.text: Kubrick directed 'A Clockwork Orange'. Who wrote the novel?
questions.explanation:
Anthony Burgess.

	Malcolm McDowell did a great job

questions.text: Who played the title role in Kubrick's 'Lolita'?
questions.explanation:
Sue Lyon.

	From the Nabokov novel

questions.text: Who played the role of Humbert Humbert, the man fascinated by Lolita?
questions.explanation:
James Mason.

	Mason is always solid

questions.text: Kubrick's most famous movie is '2001, A Space Odyssey'. Who wrote the novel?
questions.explanation:
Arthur C. Clarke

	Long - but intriguing.

questions.text: Which actor played several different roles in Kubrick's 'Dr. Strangelove'?
questions.explanation:
Peter Sellers.

	One of his best known roles, outside of the 'Pink Panther' stuff
